title: Did they use Ekko's model in making of Pyke's?
body:
Ekko's model:
https://i.pinimg.com/originals/68/5d/fe/685dfe9927d90109a153b23e72d4a311.jpg

https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/rg-champion-reveal-pyke-bloodharbor-ripper/en_US/4cc51c48fc4e185fb5409def2b3649a84b0d4339/assets/img/content/collage.jpg

I can't help but notice how similar the two character models are, especially in clothes theme. It is almost as if Pyke is a leveled up version of Ekko, even using similar abilities. Pyke also recoveres health, also dashes forward leaving a ghost behind and also has blinks and stuns, not to mention the teal glow their abilities share as well. I fully get that their playstyles will probably be different, but from the model design standpoint, this is almost a rework. 
This is how you end up with theories how Pyke is actually Ekko, who died, then his time-back activated accidentaly post mortem, resulting in him getting horrified and turning psycho because of the experience.

replies.body:
Did you mean to put this in Memes & Games?
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/rg-champion-reveal-pyke-bloodharbor-ripper/en_US/4cc51c48fc4e185fb5409def2b3649a84b0d4339/assets/img/content/wallpaper/sandwraith-splash.jpg
Look. This must be Sandstorm Ekko. XD
